subject: RE: [junit] Howto test Threads
msgSnippet: I m not totally sure I understand what you re trying to do.  What do you mean that your Junit test does not terminate ?  Are you saying the test method (like
messageBody:
I'm not totally sure I understand what you're trying to do. What do you
mean that your "Junit test does not terminate"? Are you saying the test
method (like testFoo) never returns? Or are you referring to the
problem that an assert* method called in a separate thread doesn't cause
your test to fail?


Todd.





________________________________

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
Behalf Of t_metsch
Sent: Friday, July 29, 2005 3:18 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Howto test Threads



Hi @all,

does anyone tests his threads with junit testcases? I initiate
my
Thread in setUp(). But sadly my Junit test does not terminate.

regards,

-Thijs Metsch
